title: Your First Assessment!
description: Doing this short assessment will help us determine which parts of your speech might need some practice!

tasks.Title: Quickfire Speaking
tasks.Instructions: Press the record button and say the shown word as clearly as you can, then press stop.

tasks.Title: Image Description
tasks.Instructions: Press the 'Record' button and follow the instruction in the image's caption
Prompts: Describe the colours of the image
Describe an object within the image
